ColourWords.Title: Phrasal verbs
ColourWords.Instruction: One word in each sentence is wrong. Click on the incorrect word.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: 1. We were broughtat by my grandparents.
2. I pickedoff some German when I was living in Berlin.
3. He didn't get by with his wife's family.
4. I looked over my friend when he was ill.
5. I looked off to my older brother when I was a child.
